extendedInfo.description: Origami is a fascinating and creative craft for kids. Not only will children get a real sense of satisfaction out of making these fun origami models, but they will be getting practice at following instructions, increasing their manual dexterity, and producing a fun and decorative end-product.Enjoy these easy origami models, specially adapted to make paper folding fun for children! Simple photo instructions make folding easy.We have origami for all sorts of holidays and occasions and for every day too!Origami is the art of paper folding. The word is Japanese, literally meaning to fold (oru) paper (kami).Contains diagrams Origami for beginners and step by step instructions for building your hands. This game is perfect for children and take them for a long time.Suggest baby origami - a great way to engage the child. It's not just interesting, it's very useful exercise, because when a child puts small simple details of the paper he develops fine motor skills of hands, logic, attention and patience.Psychologists of Origami:- Origami increase the activity of the right hemisphere of the brain and balance the work of both hemispheres;- Activate creative thinking;- Increase the level of intelligence in general;- Increase and stabilize at a high level of emotional state;- Reduce anxiety and help to better adapt to the severe situations;- Improve the motility of hands, fingers develop motor skills;- Improve memory and good eye;The program presents many different types of airplanes. Perfect for boys. In addition to airplanes, there is a section Moving origami. For example: a frog, boat, whirligig, windmill and other moving origami models.The program contains the following categories of origami:- Simple shapes- Fun Origami - are able to move- Sea Animals- Animals- Fruits- Vegetables- Clothing and Accessories- Furniture- Nature- Buildings- Volumetric 3D origami- Origami paper- Origami numbers and mathematical symbols- Food- Spectacular airplanes out of paper!- FlowersThe program is free and works on phones and tablets Android 2.2 and above.You will learn how to fold origami how to make airplanes, make a jumping frog.Origami (Jap. "folded paper") - the ancient art of folding paper figures. Origami is an art - which does not require you artistic skills: to make origami crane, frog, flower or dragon, you only need accuracy and patience.You do not need to remember how to add basic shapes - each model starts with a simple sheet of paper, you do not need to know the names of additions - we do not use in the texts of any special terms.Learn how to fold paper animals, birds, flowers, boxes and more on traditional Japanese and Chinese schemes.Now origami engaged not only adults but also children at different ages - from 3 to 12 years!Origami for Children can not only distract the child from anything, but also develops dexterity kids. Because of this you can give a child the opportunity to decorate the house itself. Of course, it is quite responsibly take up this task. Make up their crafts and enthrall their child, because in the course of work, and you will be interested. Feel like a kid again, and a good parent!In order to give you a free app and keep developing more free apps in the future, we are integrating a search tool to our application. This will add a few access points to your device (hence the permissions) to direct you to the web search service. Please consider using the search to help us keep creating apps. You may delete the search icon, bookmark and homepage easily. Thank you.
